Reviews.Title: Nikon BL-1
Reviews.Author: Rich56 "Photo Rich"
Reviews.Content: What can I say, it's a well-made battery housing cover for the Nikon D2X. Like all of Nikon's equipment, it's overpriced but I got tired of having to switch out the cover each time I changed the battery. It slows me down and breaks my concentration enough to be an irritation so I bought a second one.Fast delivery and no problems.Caution, Rant ahead:(I decided that I'd spare you all my POV of today's 'knock 'em out by the hundreds' mentality behind Nikon & Canon. Some other time perhaps.)

Reviews.Title: Nikon battery cover
Reviews.Author: Mingo
Reviews.Content: Exact item for my Nikon D2Xs camera. Now I don't have to use pliers to open the cover. Would buy it again and recommend it.
